definition: to do as one sees fit/to play it by ear (according to the circumstances)
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
(chess) move/trick/all right!/(dialect) to add
to wear (clothes)/to contact/to use/to apply
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with
You figure it out for yourself./Do as you please.

sentences.english: The three little pigs desperate to say, you see fit.
sentences.chinese: 三只小猪绝望地说，你看着办吧。

sentences.english: The people raised you up, what will you do in return?
sentences.chinese: 是人民在养你们，你们自己看着办。

sentences.english: What need to buy, you stuff it.
sentences.chinese: 需要买点什么，你看着办吧。

sentences.english: We'll leave this entirely to you, so do as you see fit.
sentences.chinese: 我们把这件事全托付给你，你看着办吧。

sentences.english: Oh sorry , the price is the last price, it's up to you.
sentences.chinese: 噢，负疚，这是最后的价格了，你看着办吧。

sentences.english: My best offer, you can take it or leave it.
sentences.chinese: 这是我能给的最好的数了，你看着办吧。

sentences.english: I'll see what I can do. Is that everything?
sentences.chinese: 我会看着办的。没有别的事了吧？

sentences.english: Let them see to the two brothers.
You are fending of the people, how do only by your own determination.
sentences.chinese: 是人民在养你们，你们自己看着办。

definition: You figure it out for yourself./Do as you please.
no matter (who, what etc)
to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
to make a decision/to make up one's mind
to have no right or ability to interfere in sth/it's none of your business!
don’t worry about (it, him etc)/doesn’t matter/whatever/anyway
thus/in this way/like this
get out of here!/beat it!
to do as one sees fit/It's up to you./Let's wait and see and then decide what to do.
let's talk about the unpleasant things first/let's be frank
pinyin: chou3 hua4 shuo1 zai4 qian2 tou5

definition: let it be/let it pass/forget about it
(coll.) Don't waste your breath./Save it!
solely engrossed in one thing/just (one thing, no need to worry about the rest)/simply/by all means/please feel free/do not hesitate (to ask for sth)
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
(dialect) very
contraction of 不用[bu4 yong4]/need not/please don't
